narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Teambuild INC is a Non-emergency Medical Transport (VAN) provider based in Methuen, MA. From 2018-01 through 2019-05, this provider received $209K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 691 beneficiaries, billing 4 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 4.3× the national median for A0130 (A0130), at $125 per claim vs. the median of $29. This places them well above the 99th percentile nationally.
Billing stopped in 2019-05, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
